rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual language without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
'were found to have' is not a moderate verb for Q3.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual data on cases in mammals.
The segment contains a scale contrast ('14 out of 134') but no minimiser token.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Reports factual data (found to have avian flu) which is part of surveillance capability.
